title: College of Business and Management
description: The College of Business and Management offers a diverse array of programs aimed at providing students with a comprehensive education in various business-related disciplines.

title: College of Hospitality Management
description: The College of Hospitality Management offers a comprehensive program in BS in Hospitality Management (BSHM), providing students with a solid foundation in the principles of hospitality, hotel management, and tourism. The curriculum covers areas such as food and beverage management, event planning, and customer service.

title: College of Information Technology Education
description: The College of Information Technology Education offers a rigorous program in BS in Information Technology (BSIT), designed to prepare students for careers in teaching information technology at various academic levels. The curriculum covers a broad range of topics, including programming languages, database management, educational technology, and pedagogical strategies specific to IT education.

title: College of Criminology
description: The College of Criminology offers a specialized program with a focus on understanding, preventing, and addressing criminal behavior.

title: College of Arts and Education
description: The College of Arts and Education offers a diverse range of programs aimed at nurturing creativity, knowledge, and effective teaching skills.

title: Senior High School
description: Goldenstate College offers diverse tracks in the Senior High School program:
